description: Aggressive value-momentum hybrid with options overlay. Combines fundamental value metrics (P/E, P/B, FCF yield), price momentum (3m, 6m, 12m returns), quality screening (ROE, profit margins, growth), and options strategies (covered calls, protective puts). Targets Sharpe > 0.8, max drawdown < 35%. Portfolio: 15-30 positions with 30-day minimum hold.
author: shane
